body.p:
Ordnance Department
Camp Nelson
February 25th\1864
To His Excellency,
Governor Bramlette,
Governor of Kentucky
Dear Sir

Having Served my Country as an officer & Soldier for nearly three years, as an Infantry Soldier & having bin disabled by the loss of my right Arm while engaged in the line of duty at the battle or Richmond Ky, I am disabled as an instructer because I cannot handle a musket, & my regiment having reenlisted for three years I am anxious to continue in the Service if I can do my Country ay good whatever,
In view of the facts above Stated, I have the honor to request that you grant me permission to recruit a company of, Heavy, Artilary as a defense for the State of Ky,

I have the honor to be
Very Respt you obt Servt
Lieut, W, H, Ridenaur
18th\ Ky Vol Inft, & act ord offiser
